meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roger Christensen Karin Heckl Alex Boisvert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4029.

td.p: Roger Christensen, a registered nurse and pre-med student from Los Angeles, California
Karin Heckl, a graphic artist from Atlanta, Georgia
Alex Boisvert, a graduate student from Los Angeles, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $47,400)

tr.td: THE 18th CENTURY
HANDWEAR
ACT UP
AT YOUR LEISURE
SHAKESPEAREAN CHARACTERS
FRUIT

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Name of 3 French kings in the century, & of a gold French coin of the time')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Name of 3 French kings in the century, & of a gold French coin of the time

mittens

')
